description: Returns the sum of a range of cells.
Calculates the average of a group of numbers.
Returns the smallest number in a set of values.
Returns the largest number in a set of values.
Counts the number of cells that contain numbers.
Counts the number of non-empty cells in a range.
Rounds a number to a specified number of digits.
Returns a random number between the numbers you specify.
Joins several text strings into one string.
Returns the first character(s) in a text string based on the number specified.
Returns the last character(s) in a text string based on the number specified.
Returns a specific number of characters from a text string, starting at the position you specify.
Converts a text string to uppercase.
Converts a text string to lowercase.
Looks for a value in the first column of a range and returns a value in the same row from another column.
Looks for a value in the top row of a range and returns a value in the same column from another row.
Returns a value from a table or range based on row and column numbers.
Returns the relative position of an item in an array that matches a specified value.
Returns one value if a condition is true and another value if it's false.
Returns TRUE if all arguments are TRUE; otherwise, returns FALSE.
Returns TRUE if any argument is TRUE; otherwise, returns FALSE.
Reverses the value of its argument.
Returns the current date.
Returns the current date and time.
Returns the serial number of a particular date.
Returns the year corresponding to a date.
Returns the month corresponding to a date.
Returns the day of the month corresponding to a date.
